main event: The observer sighted two lights that traveled east and disappeared after about 2 minutes.
interesting points: The lights were brighter than a star yet as bright as a house light., The sighting occurred in misty and rainy conditions, making it difficult to see the stars., The observer was 38 years old,, The lights' movement was depicted in a hand-drawn diagram pointing from west to east., The object was reported to make a sound similar to a moth.
sighted object: two bright lights in the sky
witness description: the observer and another person who was with them
